language.title: Choose your language
language.subtitle: Select the language you prefer for Peak

slide1.title: Track your workouts like never before
slide1.description: Peak tracks your progress in real time - get instant feedback when you lift more.

slide2.title: Progress that feels rewarding
slide2.description: Earn stickers when you hit milestones - new records, streaks, consistency

slide3.title: Turn your workouts into memories
slide3.description: Each session becomes a card: your photo, your stats, your achievements, all in one place.

notifications.title: Never miss a workout
notifications.description: Notifications help us remind you of your planned sessions and keep you motivated to stay consistent.
notifications.disabledMessage: You can enable notifications later in the app settings.
notifications.error: An error occurred while requesting permission.

camera.title: Capture your moments
camera.description: Take a photo at the end of each session to create workout memory cards and track your progress visually.
camera.deniedMessage: We need access to your camera to take workout photos. You can enable it later in settings.
camera.error: An error occurred while requesting permission.

profile.title: Create your profile
profile.description: Let's start by personalizing your profile with your name and a photo.
profile.photoPermissionMessage: We need access to your photos to set your profile picture.
profile.choosePhotoMessage: Where would you like to take your photo from?
profile.cameraPermissionMessage: We need access to your camera to take a photo.
profile.photoError: An error occurred while selecting the photo.

profileSuccess.title: You're all set!
profileSuccess.description: You can now create your workouts and start tracking your progress.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: How to track workouts and metrics

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.subtitle: Workout reminders
notifications.permissionMessage: Enable notifications to receive workout reminders
notifications.sectionDescription: Receive one reminder per day when you have a scheduled workout
notifications.infoText: You will receive one notification per day maximum, only on days when you have a scheduled workout.

dev.resetOnboardingMessage: This will reset your onboarding and show it again on next app launch. Continue?
dev.resetOnboardingSuccess: Onboarding will be shown on next app launch.

createName.title: Name your workout
createName.subtitle: Give your session a name to track it easily!

success.title: Workout created!
success.description: Your workout has been successfully created and will be added to your workouts list.

exercise.createSubtitle: Choose a clear and recognizable name

complete.title: Workout Complete
complete.subtitle: Great job on completing your workout!

perfectExecution.title: Perfect Execution!
perfectExecution.subtitle: You completed every single set - no shortcuts, just pure dedication

pr.title: New Personal Record!
pr.subtitle: You've broken through your limits - this is what progress looks like

star.title: Session Master!
star.subtitle: Another completion of this workout - your consistency is building strength

streak.title: {{count}} Day Streak!
streak.subtitle: You're building consistency - keep that momentum going!

volume.title: Volume Beast!
volume.subtitle: You've pushed more weight than ever before - your strength is growing
